text: The Trust Fund shall maintain a designated agent to accept service of process for the Trust Fund. Notice to or service upon the agent is notice or service upon the Trust Fund.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 6-2135.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 4-1341.01.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-1341.01.

DC CODE § 4-1341.05

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Child Abuse and Neglect Prevention Children's Trust Fund.
